thread.title: Assess investments for long term: Dhirendra Kumar
thread.title_full: Assess investments for long term: Dhirendra Kumar

title: Assess investments for long term: Dhirendra Kumar
text: Assess investments for long term: Dhirendra Kumar 30 Aug 2015, 11:33AM IST Copy URL Embed Dhirendra Kumar, CEO of Value Research suggests investors to continue with investing in the markets and assess the investment for long-term. Talking of the market volatility, Dhirendra says that crash was only a reaction to Chinese slowdown, India is placed better. For the latest videos, follow us on twitter Follow @EconomicTimes 145 views
